Eggs.Name: Peggbert
Eggs.Description: This egg was pegged for his punishment of doing to many egg puns. Their insides might Scramble

Eggs.Name: Geggda
Eggs.Description: This egg is gagged for doing to many egg jokes

Eggs.Name: Shibeggi
Eggs.Description: This egg is bound down by their domineggtrix

Eggs.Name: Sissy
Eggs.Description: This egg is very eggccentric

Eggs.Name: Bimbo
Eggs.Description: Look at those 2 Egg shells on her chest

Eggs.Name: Bondage
Eggs.Description: As secure as a second shell

Eggs.Name: Chasteggty
Eggs.Description: This egg has been locked up until next easter by her domeggant. I hope they don't Crack before time is up

Eggs.Name: Leggther
Eggs.Description: This egg has been cracked down on chatter with our Eggstravagant. Their Leather Gag is no yolk

Eggs.Name: Sunny Ovum
Eggs.Description: This egg is ready for the sun, let's hope they they don't become Sunny Side Up

Eggs.Name: Snap, Crack, Yolk
Eggs.Description: This egg is ready to show his Yolk everywhere, with a nice Orange glow as the whip, Snap, Cracks and Yolks.

Eggs.Name: Lashin' Shelly
Eggs.Description: This egg will punish any poorly done egg. Cracking egg shells, and scrambling up what's inside.

Eggs.Name: Leggy
Eggs.Description: This egg isn't afriad to spread their Yolk everywhere and show off their feet for you.

Eggs.Name: Elastic Eggla
Eggs.Description: This egg's shell is shiner than a Sunny side egg. See every curve of her Shell in her tight outfit.

Eggs.Name: Chickadee
Eggs.Description: This egg is ready to crack open to fulfill their master's every command. (but where does the collar fit?)

Eggs.Name: Steggy
Eggs.Description: This egg is high in the sky with their delicate balance like an Egg and Spoon race, commanding attention wherever she goes.

Eggs.Name: Eggstraordinary Pooch
Eggs.Description: This egg is ready to be your companion. This pooch needs to be careful or it might poached all of your balls

Eggs.Name: Mummy? Wait what?
Eggs.Description: This egg is ready for whatever Easter Egg hunt you have. But it's not the one laying the eggs right?

Eggs.Name: Domineggtrix
Eggs.Description: This egg will like a well-cracked egg, unleash the hidden pleasures within, guiding her submissives

Eggs.Name: Breggda
Eggs.Description: This egg is like a cracked egg revealing its golden yolk, each expression reveals layers of pleasure and satisfaction.

Eggs.Name: Buzz
Eggs.Description: This egg gentley buzz and with a tantalizing hum, this vibrating egg takes pleasure to eggstraordinary heights.

Duds.Name: Running tracks
Duds.Description: Seems like the bunny has ran through this channel...

Duds.Name: Jumping right
Duds.Description: Seems like the bunny jumped through this channel...

Duds.Name: Lost ribbon
Duds.Description: Seems like the bunny was preparing some eggs here...

Duds.Name: Jumping left
Duds.Description: Seems like the bunny scrambled through this channel...

Duds.Name: Empty basket
Duds.Description: Seems like the bunny lost their egg basket in this channel...
